topic.title: Existence Of Environmental Allergy - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.103"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69747-4" EMS Existence of environmental allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10214)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10215)
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69747-4" EMS Existence of environmental allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10214)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10215)
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
